name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Quality Engineer with over 13 years of experience in building resilient and high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven expertise in **Kubernetes**, **AWS Fault Injection Simulator**, **Chaos Mesh**, and **Istio** to enhance system robustness and scalability. Skilled in implementing **GitOps** methodologies and performance tuning principles to optimize distributed systems for peak performance metrics.
Strong background in utilizing monitoring tools such as **CloudWatch** and **Prometheus** for ensuring continuous system health and performance reliability. Adept at facilitating resilience testing and troubleshooting using **Litmus** and **HoneyComb** while adhering to rigorous compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Further enhances systems with innovative AI/ML capabilities, leveraging **FastAPI**, **Django**, and cloud-native deployments with **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to driving automation and efficiency through robust CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless integration and delivery of software solutions.
